name: adventureworks
description: This is adventure works style preset

msv-accent-brand-color.description: Brand accent is the accent color used to represent the brand. Its typically used on primary buttons.

msv-accent-brand-alt-color.description: Brand accent alternate is the accent hover color. Its typically used on primary buttons.

msv-accent-secondary-btn.description: Brand accent secondary is the accent hover color. Its typically used on secondary buttons.

msv-bg-color.description: Background color is used for page and module background such as buybox, carousel, cart etc.

msv-body-bg-color.description: Body background color is used for page.
